column3:
“Nice Clear heady high that swoops down into a nice calm relaxed feel that keeps anxiety and migraines away .  
I can run this one day or night ,  Tastes and looks really good also .”

“Nailed it again Arizona Natural Selections. You're the only dispensary around creating awesome strains. Ones like Nuclear Cookies, urkle train haze, and now this one.
The combination of 2 of my favorites was a genius idea. The taste is out of this world.

get this before it's gone!”
“Worked halfway descent for my back pain, but didn't seem to help the shooting pains.  Was a relaxing treat though.”
“This one is my absolute favorite.   Tastes great and gives a total body relaxation.   Can't fall asleep?  This is the one that does it for me.  Highly recommended.”
“Very relaxing, but you can still function and get shit done.”

“This strain is one that never disappoints. From the aesthetic appeal of trichome covered purple and green flowers to the delicious taste of berries with a hint of skunk blackberry bubble is top shelf medicine. The effects are heavy on the body and energetic and euphoric in the mind. Great strain for end of day pain, stress, and depression.”

“Although it didn't make me sleepy like I'd hoped it did have a great smell and taste. Euphoric effect and caused me to have a rad conversation with the boyfriend. Eventually when I laid down to sleep about an hour after dosing I was able to rest peacefully. I would purchase this strain again for sure.”
“A motivating, euphoric high combined with power body effects. Smells and tastes amazing, too!”

“Made me relaxed and tired when awake but but jumpy after I fell asleep- I awoke from a nice sleep every time the house creaked. Also had some negative thoughts. I think I'll keep looking for a nice sleep aid”
“Great strain for pain, I keep it in flower and cartridge!”
“This strain is pretty awesome. I went in looking for a good indica dominant hybrid and got exactly what I ordered. Great flavor and high!”

“IT IS THE SOUL OF GOODNESS AND JOY AND IT MADE ME SO HAPPY I FELT LIKE I WAS GOING TO BURST! Seriously, I have never used an indica that behaved this way.  It did not slow down my thinking, it was a very clearheaded strain. I felt like I was in a race car as I sat in front my PC, pouring over Leafly, wondering what the hell I had just vaped. The euphoria was more powerful than any I've experienced with indicas or sat...”
“Tasty and unforgettable.”
“It's okay, but not what I call an Indica. Berry taste but the high isn't as good as it looks.”

“I recently purchased this strain made right here in Arizona.  I live local made,  but aside that I just smoked a bowl in my pipe and definetly feel euphoric and a very wavelike body high.  Perfect indica for a chill Friday night!”

“I bought this on a last decision. I saw this strain and immediately noticed frosty trichomes on these amazing buds! This not only smells fantastic but tastes like sweet berries. This leaves you feeling heavenly and lost in a world of positivity. It comes with both a body and mind high for me. This is definitely a new favorite, I will be stocking up on this I suggest you do the same!!!!”
“Clean, potent though not overwhelming. Very safe" relaxed high without anxiety. Mind clarity is good for this indica. Day or night use but as their review states: 80/20 indica. Zero neg symptoms.”"

“Such a fun relaxing strain,  doesn't make me sleepy but helps ease pain and stress!  I got it at AZ natural Selection and the buds looked amazing and smelled amazing.  I love the high of this, relaxing, creative, and euphoric!”
“This was such an instant relaxer!!!!”

“This says indica dominant. I'm not one to get much benefit out of most indicas/dominant hybrids. But man!! This is one that is just BOMB. White and dark berry colored frosty nugulets. The sativa in it is juuust enough to provide anxiety relief and the indica is one of the very few that actually acts as a semi-sativa for me. Smoke it at night however. Because it can make ya tired. Sweet and tasty. Pungent. I get prett...”
“All around great strain! The buds are nice & dense! Look, taste & smell is amazing !!! Great for relaxing & mellow high !!!”
“This is one I'll continue to look for, great effects.”
